textBox.richText: The MOBIO consortium is happy to inform about the publication of the official reference paper for the MOBIO freely database available <here>: Bi-Modal Person Recognition on a Mobile Phone: using mobile phone data Chris McCool, Sébastien Marcel, Abdenour Hadid, Matti Pietikainen, Pavel Matejka, Jan Cernocky, Norman Poh, Josef Kittler, Anthony Larcher, Christophe Lévy, Driss Matrouf, Jean-François Bonastre, Phil Tresadern, and Timothy Cootes. IEEE ICME Workshop on Hot Topics in Mobile Multimedia, 2012.
